name: Among The Trees (LittleBellGames)
description:
As a Mother Bird, you fly in an endless forest full of danger.

Avoid trees while searching for the precious eggs and guide the newborn birdies all day long toward the Great Tree, a safe place appearing at night only.

- Race at full speed in an endless forest

- Collect birds to increase your score

- Survive as long as you can, and try to rest a little at nightfall
